docs.snippet: Mayor La Guardia's plan for subsidizing exports to Central and South America was opposed today by Secretary Hull. Mr. Hull indicated that he thought it did not fit in with his "liberal" trade program.

docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian democracy under President Getulio Vargas has been greatly strengthened by the appointment of Dr. Oswaldo Aranha, former Ambassador to the United States, as Foreign Minister, according to Dr. J. J. Osuna, dean of the College of Education of the University of Puerto Rico, who has just returned from Brazil.

docs.snippet: The downward trend in credit mar conditions in Latin America, apparent in the closing months of 1937, was arrested and, to some degree, reversed in the opening three months of this year, Kenneth H. Campbell, manager of the foreign credit interchange...
docs.lead_paragraph: The downward trend in credit mar conditions in Latin America, apparent in the closing months of 1937, was arrested and, to some degree, reversed in the opening three months of this year, Kenneth H. Campbell, manager of the foreign credit interchange bureau of the National Association of Credit Men, reported yesterday in issuing the bureau's quarterly survey of credit and collection conditions in South and Central America.
